content.detailedDescription: At about 10:30 pm i went to a friends house and as i got to the back door ,before i knocked , a light came on in the sky to the west. i noticed it because it came on like a light bulb. it couldn't be a star because it was quite foggy and you couldn't see the sky anyway.So , it caught my eye as it lit up , then it dropped down and as it dropped it changed shape,well the light changed shape anyway. it turned to a teardrop shape as it came down to which i estimate to be about a half mile to the west of where i was standing and it was about less than a 1000 ft off the ground. so, i knocked on my friends door hoping he would answer right away so he could see what i was seeing,after i knocked i looked to see where it was, by then it was lower and coming toward me and it was rocking side to side and as it was rocking it was changing shape from round to oval. not a sound from the light, which i thought might be a helicopter, but the fact that it was changing shape made my mind up for me. when the object started to move east, coming toward me, my sister was in the car we came in and from where she was sitting ,if she looked out the windshield she would have been able to see it. so, it was go tell her to look up or wait for someone to answer the door. by the time my friends girlfriend answered the door the object was almost right above us. while she went to go get him the object went over the house about 75-150 feet up. after it went over the house it continued east for another second or two and then went up at an angle above the fog and left a "hole" in the fog, so to speak. then after the object was gone my buddy answers the door and when i got back to the car my sister was texting and wasn't even looking up. so, i guess i'm the only one that see this thing so feel free to call or e-mail i have more stories. thanks for your time.
content.summary: A very bright light that seemed to change shape as it moved

content.detailedDescription:
I want to talk about what i saw, i saw a program that ufos dont exist because people can not remember things correctly after time, i dont remember a lot of things correct but this has made such an impact on me i cant forget.  i dont know what i saw but would like to. i will take a lie detector test,  hypnosis or anything that will help me understand what i saw.

i dont remember the date year, the month or the day i cant remember,  the time is approx. base on the time some got off work

i know it was summer because of daylight savings( days are longer)  

ok  here is my truth ( not a story)  i was picking up my girl friend sister from work, she got off  
at 7pm or 7:30pm, we ( me and my girl friend, at that time) were driving 5 mile to pick up her 
sister from work, i was driving she ( the girl friend) leaned over and pointed out my window she asked me what is that, without really looking just glancing i said the sun, but i knew when i finished my statement it was not the sun, we continue to watch the object for a few seconds, i'm driving, watching the object  then i notice a state trooper coming towards me in the other lane( two lane road) i checked my speed, i knew u was not speeding because i slow down to watch the object, i became angry when i saw the trooper do a u turn because i thought i was getting stopped, but he pulled over and parked, i guess he saw the object to, we continued to watch this object as we drove, it was huge and orange, no sound. i don't know what it was and i don't know what happen to it, it was there then it disappeared, it did not float to the ground, the last thing i remember it was huge like the sun and the after a couple of minutes it was gone from the sky. it disappeared it did not land.  i don't know what it was but i know what it wasn't. it wasn't a plane (no sound) a flare (it never sunk towards the ground) and it was not the sun ( it was dust, the sun had set) it seemed to stop in the air when i first saw it, then like a light bulb it was there then it was gone in minutes, it was so big.
content.summary: Huge, orange and no sound

content.detailedDescription: was 1968 in turnersvill new jersey about 30 miles out side of andrew's airforce baise.We saw above the tree line ! one glowing ball of light as we walked it moved along above the tree's !(no sound at all!) so when we seen it tracking us !! we ran like hell ! i do not remember much after that ?? but twenty eight year's later while watching the show(sightings) it showed a glowing orb ! and bang i remember!!! paul & i ran to the corner of the street's of whitman dr,&cornwall terr. turnersville new jersey !! a blue light beam came out of orb and froze us right where we stood ! next thing i remember was not being able to move!! ?Like frozen(yet i remember (not being cold) next i was on a table flat i raised my head seen paul on the table across the room?? however it was unlike any room i have ever been in before /or since it had no wall's ! a brillent whit,light inside it and two being"s standing over me !! as i looked at my friend paul i seen them !! over him as well, as i got upset the taller one standing over me touched my head ! center with his,?/ i say his because he was the taller of thr two next to me as well there was two over paul one taller one shorter ! the tall on touched my farhead i went lipm as a dish rag ! all of my thought's were calmed ! i ask? thhe taller one over top of me !! who are you !!???? we are you're friend's !! why do you look so diffrent !! we are you're friend's ! why, before i could even get it out?It's nessary !! all communtions where done not with speach! all mentaly done ! long and short of this is i seen paul being turned over, i tryed yelling at paul ! to watch out !?And ahain the taller being again touched my pinial galn ! i went out; and one more time before they dropped us both off ! un harmed- fully clothed ! and last thing i remember was him/ telling me never tell anyone about this !!!! and herer i am telling you !! there is a spot or insision on my lower spine ! and i am 100% sure of what happend ! but it took seeing it on tv. to jogg my memiories of the event,was day when we saw the orb,and night when i was a woke by milltary hellpcopter's ! next morning  i go out side ! oh now looking back i did not tell anyone in fact paul an i never talked about it??? we did not remember at that time paul still may not !!?? so as i go out side a tall man with a very black rimed black hat, kinda like policeman.So asked?? what happen last night?? little boy it's not safe, excaped convict,broke out of jail !! now i know this man to be a man in black !!!  i had a lost of time ! and mark on my spine and knowlage of how they/live?? no war's ! no food as we know it !All this information was flood into me ! paul was in a jail 29 year's later i wrot to him ! he answered my letter, but did not want to ask him right off the bat!So i wrote asked him an recived a notice he was unabled to be found??
content.summary: Walking with friend looked up we both seen a glowing ball of light that tracked us as we walked.

content.detailedDescription:
Between 0615 & 0620 am, located a few miles east of nas jax, observed what i thought was a satellite type object in space moving southward. followed the object for 20seconds, then saw a bright white 'bloom of light' approx 6-times larger than the moving object and a good istance 'ahead of it' in space. this light bloom appeared, expanded and then faded similar to the burst of fireworks, but much faster. i kept watching and then observed a 2nd light bloom, same as the first, but in another point in the sky, again, some distance 'ahead' of the moving object. this bloom also dissipating exactly as the first one did. i had the unmistakable feeling that these had to be explosions in space of some kind. no way the light blooms could have been aircraft lights.
location: in 'the forest' neighborhood in mandarin (suburb of jacksonville) walking my dog. i noticed the object because i enjoy 'stargazing', have a telescope, and being near nas jax enjoy seeing all kinds of aircraft in the sky right over the house. important: while i thought i saw the moving object make a gentle turn, i could not swear to this as i was still slowly walking when i first observed it, and only after i stopped walking did i then see the event described. after the 2nd light bloom i lost track of the moving object and for me the event was over.
content.summary: 1 steadily moving object, 2 related explosion-like blooms of light near the moving object in space, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Would you like to catch one of these things on the ground?

call,610 626 8875.
content.summary: Discs 40ft. 50ft range

content.detailedDescription:
I was 16 visiting my aunt with my folks .Around 1700 or so i went out side to enjoy the night sky as i look up i saw two oval shape objects space apart fly straigh up, they disappeared and reappeared further up i brought my folks out to watch as they step out they saw the same obejects as i did as they did the same thing again were going straight up and disappeared from view ,they went inside and i stayed looking at the night sky for a few more mins. as i turn around to go inside there was a object over the house ,it wasnt a ufo but one of our own space craft,i look at it in detail as it had a black tip long and white with checkers circling the body of the rocket. the ship look like it was burning at the end i notice flames. it was the leaght of my aunts house but not its true size. and stars in the back ground it look to be burning up.  i stood in awe just looking at it.I was not scared at all ,but felt they were telling me they were watching us . i look around but there was nothing around me nor did the ufo or the craft i was looking make any noise. i stood there until it disappeared. and i went inside and told everyone what i saw. till this day i have search the net for this aircraft i saw i have yet to find it. i really need to know if anyone else has seen this or know of this ship i saw. i have seen my share of ufo from tenn. to fla.
i feel this is as close of a encounter i wish to ever get with one.And still wish why they showed it to me.I have question but never recieved answers. can you give me any thing at all!?
content.summary: 2 oval white glowing ships and one unknown.

content.detailedDescription:
On new year's eve of 2007 we went out on our back patio to see the fireworks residents set off. while waiting for the midnight hour, we both sighted a diamond formation in the eastern sky over reddington pass. (tanque verde mtns.)four brightly shining objects were positioned what we judged to be about 7 miles away form us. our impression was that they appeared to be a thousand yards apart from each other, with the top one about 2,000 yards from the bottom one. they were brighter than any stars appearing that night and remained stationary for 40-50 minutes, all total. we had never seen such objects in the past so remained focused on them the entire time. when the diamond shape dispersed - each object went on a separate path - in various directions. the rapid speed with which they left caused them to disappear within moments. they did not return.

on new year's eve of 2008, we went out & looked in the same, general direction & saw a similar formation. this time there appeared to be five objects. there was more movement this time as they rearranged their positions, sometimes stretching out further than the others in the diamond. we video-filmed what we could, but had no zoom on the camera so it appears as a bright mass.

in 2008, we first noticed a silent, plane with only a minimum of lights on the edges - fly by very low and very close to our elevated location. having viewed the stealth at the davis-monthan airbase (in tucson) on more than one occasion & up very close - we were able to identify this plane as such. it was immediately after observing it's silent movement past out locale that our attention was drawn to the object formation in the eastern sky.

our curiosity rendered us immovable on the first occasion, but on the following year - we moved quickly to film it, regardless of the fact that we are both nonprofessional photographers. not being drinkers - we were in full command of our faculities & knew we were witnessing something out of the ordinary. however, many sightings take place in az between phoenix & tucson so we weren't completely shocked. 

after 20 years of being tucson residents, we have recently moved to nm.
content.summary: Stationary formation of 4 objects forming a diamond shape - dispersing in various directions after several minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi john, tried to call you but your mail-box is full. they are back!! at 6:45 p.M. we saw a single light, smaller than the previous sightings.
then two together. both were due north, up high. at 7:15 p.M. we saw a strip of lights going north to south. then the biggie happened! 7 large lights came on one at a time from right to left in a straight line - on, off, on, off - we counted out loud till 7. nothing since. wow. hugh ran to get the camera just in case but we saw no more. we shall keep the camera on the table!

note: report filed by john fegel, id#9302. witnesses request no contacts from mufon.
content.summary: Anomalous lights over las cruces

content.detailedDescription: We were filming the trees swaying in the wind. we didn't even see the lights when we were filming. when we played the video back we saw the lights coming down through the clouds. you can clearly see one of the last ones cut a hole in the sky. we have a hd version of this.
content.summary: Lights coming down from the sky

content.detailedDescription: I walked onto the front porch of my house to feed the dogs when i noticed that the sky over the tree-line in front of my house was a very hazy red color. it was sometime in the early evening (around dusk i think) and i was home alone. i then noticed a triad of red glowing lights orbiting in the shape of a triangle. they seemed to outline the bottom of a craft much, much larger than an airplane in the sky. it was as if the object was very close and right above the trees. it was moving  in a western direction and then disappeared behind the trees. the red haze in the sky seemed to be stronger around the object and weaker the further away from the object, as if it were emanating from the ufo. i have always been very interested in ufo's and extraterrestrial life. i remember thinking that i should go get my camera but i didn't want  to miss the ufo. i also remember thinking that i had to call someone and tell them what was happening when i first spotted the ufo! i was so excited. however, all i remember is walking back into the house after watching it disappear and forgetting about it! that is the exact opposite of a normal reaction from me. in fact, i didn't even remember that it happened until a couple of days later and the entire event just came back to me. i still can't remember what i did after walking back inside. in fact, i can't remember the rest of the evening until my family came back home.
content.summary: Red orbiting glowing triangle seen over tree-line from my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up at the moon and stars when i saw a very bright, golden ball sailing through the air. there was no sound from it at all. it was moving north to south and i saw a few little bright balls of light appear at either side of the object briefly, a couple of times. i ran to keep it in view as it moved behind tall trees and it kept going then disappeared before my eyes, but not as if it had disappeared into the distance, but all it once while it was still large looking. i am familiar with the satellites that go over here, and this was different.
content.summary: Good sized golden sphere, silent, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, down thompson dr. and i looked to the side just above a yellow house that used to be a daycare, and i saw a large cylindrical object, moving very low through the trees, but just above  the houses, i stopped my car and watched it to the annoyance to the cars behind me. i don't know how no one else even seemed to notice it. i only told my sister and she thought i was kidding and when i told her i wasn't she seemed to think i was lying. i never told anyone else. i know what i saw and i am not saying its aliens but i know it wasn't a blimp or anything else there were trees behind it and in front it. i have no history of seeing things that are not there. i don't know what it was but i know it was something
content.summary: Red and about the length of a school bus the red was almost a rust color.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, down thompson dr. and i looked to the side just above a yellow house that used to be a daycare, and i saw a large cylindrical object, moving very low through the trees, but just above  the houses, i stopped my car and watched it to the annoyance to the cars behind me. i don't know how no one else even seemed to notice it. i only told my sister and she thought i was kidding and when i told her i wasn't she seemed to think i was lying. i never told anyone else. i know what i saw and i am not saying its aliens but i know it wasn't a blimp or anything else there were trees behind it and in front it. i have no history of seeing things that are not there. i don't know what it was but i know it was something
content.summary: Red and about the length of a schoolbus the red was almost a rust color

content.detailedDescription:
First off, i would never usually believe in this type of thing but i'm in awe of what i saw tonight.
coming home from work, i took the pa turnpike ramp from the willow grove mall area so i beleive it would be montgomery county?  once on the turnpike for a few minutes i saw in the distance two bright white lights. it caught my eye and i remember thinking why a plane was flying so low to the ground.  i was driving straight towards the light and noticed it was getting closer and not flying away. as i was getting closer i noticed that i wasn't a plane at all and that it wasn't moving just hovering!!!  the part of the turnpike i was on was in the middle of a valley so trees lined both sides of me.  this object was to my left side above the tree line with the bright lights just hovering.  i was trying to get a close look without wrecking.  it wasn't a helicopter just a very large saucer object.  the rest of traffic was slowing down as well to get a look too.  so i'm sure there are many other reports of the sighting.  the faces of the drivers around me were just as perplexed.  this happened right before the road splits to take 476 or the allentown ramp.  by the time i took the ramp i lost sight.  
again this is something i would typically never take the time to write about but i truly feel that i have seen an unidentified flying object!!
content.summary: Typical flying saucer shape with two very bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Observed one very large saucer shaped object traveling from nw to se at around 1pm. no flashing lights and no sound. just a brilliance of gold in the afternoon sun. no eradic behavior.
then, another observed at 8pm. traveling from s to n, flashing lights of green, blue, orange, red and brilliant white. saucer with dome on top and a long tail behind carrying another round orbital ship glowing red, green and white. from a distance, blackness outlined both ships including the tail. darker than the night sky on a three quarter moon. flying eradically, bouncing up and down, then turning to repeat, then turning again and shooting off at tremendous speed and dissapearing only approximately two miles from first location. only to return fifteen minutes later to bounce a few more times and then speeding north westward across the sky.

two of us noticed and watched the second of these two ships.

i am an avid watcher and do so every night.
i am an abductee and have been since age three.
my feelings are always the same. when are they going to come for me again?
why so many years in between? are they waiting for me to move back home? or, have they lost interest in me now that i have gotten older?
content.summary: Cool quiet evening and clear skys. observation east over the ocala national forest bombing range and viewed of ufo.

content.detailedDescription: On one night so long ago, though it seems like only yesterday i had a triangle craft come over my van it hoverred there for about 2 to four minutes it was shaped like to triangles end to end it was aprox 7 to 10 meteres in length and and about 3 to 5 meters in width at the top it had countours not unlike the stealth bomber the contours were 100 times more refined underneath there was crystyl like center[crystyl ball] it had glass like tubes running from the crystyl ball to each corner of the craft with lighting like bolts pulsing back and forth from the crystyl ball it was intense blue light it had laser like flashing light emerging froiom the side of craft as if it were emrging from the metal itself no bulbs or source of the flashing light to speak off at the time this was happining i was laying in bed blowing smoke rings out my window it was a dead still i was impressed with the smoke rings i was making lol that when i seen the craft come over my van i was frozen with fear and at the same time transfixed on the on the crystyl ball and lightning like currents pulsing through the tubes i recall looking at my digitil clock just before the craft came over it was 12 a,m exactly when it was all over it was 2 am exactly some how i had lost 2 hours of time it seemd like only 2 to 4 minutes i dont recall seing any aliens but how ever beforew the craft came over i did see a grey apear in my mind i found it odd because it was not my thought black eyes as this wasa happing i was closing and opening my eyes saying to my self this is not happining but when i re opend my eyes the craft was still there 3 days later i found out there was other people who had seen the craft it was reported in the local paper 13 people had witnessed the craft in the park ridge area where i lived at the time 1 women apperntly rang air force and the told here it was private euntrapernour in a private blimp 15 years later i still live in fear i cant sleep with out thinking about the event most nights i have drawn apicture and will attach to this
content.summary: Triangle ufo hovvering above my van

content.detailedDescription: Spotted six star like ufos going in diffrent directions but all at the same time they appeared
content.summary: Star like ufos

content.detailedDescription:
at 5pm on sunday jan. 24th i had a strong feeling, almost a physical need to go in west direction from my house. while driving west on eldorado blv., i���ve noticed bullet/cigar shaped shiny silver object hovering high in the sky, in the sw direction from mckinney, tx.  it was not moving at all, which is exactly what draw my attention. i was pretty exited and was hoping not to loose the sight of the object while finding an appropriate parking spot. i���ve parked my car, got out and proceed watching this object. after a few minuets the object got very bright and vanished. i felt happy,joyful and exited during and  after this experience.  

   it���s hard to say an exact location, over which this object was hovering, but it looked like it was in proximity of dfw airport, but did not look or behave as a conventional aircraft. plus, there were a few airplanes going at the same direction, but they were flying much lower, then the location of this object.
content.summary: Bullet/cigar shaped object hovaring high in the sky s/w of mckinney, tx.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my front porch at about 10pm cst.  i saw a point of light at roughly 20k feet moving in a north-by-northeasterly direction.  it was moving extremely fast in a manner i can only describe as smooth.  the speed was incredible, i've never seen anything at that height moving remotely close to that speed.  i watched as the light moved in my direction and, apparently, slightly upwards.  there were clear skies with not a cloud in the sky.  after 3-5 seconds, the brilliant white light got much brighter, approximately 2-3 times as bright, then disappeared.  there was absolutely no noise.  this was near braker lane, just east of i-35.
content.summary: Single point of brilliant white light moving extremely fast.  the light got much brighter and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard porch smoke a cigarette and  looking the sky when i saw a traveling bright sphere, bigger than a star, moving from west to north east. i thought that the light was a military plane but it wasn't because it moving so fast (a plane can not fly like that) and then turned off the light and disappear. i was completely shocking and scare because i didn't believe in ufo until last night.
content.summary: Travel bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
What i am reporting is actually an ongoing sighting, in that i have been observing the events that i will detail since at least july 2009 (which is when i first noticed the lights and their odd behavior).

i live in the foothills above fort collins, colorado, at an elevation of 7100 feet.Fort collins is a city of over 100,000 people. my home is 35 miles northwest of downtown fort collins, and at night i can easily see the city's lights, even with the unaided eye. i am a 60 year old professional woman. i work full time in fort collins for a government agency.

out of curiosity, i initially began to use binoculars at night to see if i could identify my workplace from my rural home. there are a couple of tall buildings with red lights on the roof that stand beside my building, and i thought that it would be fun to be able to id my workplace from home.

on or about mid july 2009, at about 10:30 pm, i saw a large, (from my vantage the size of a pencil eraser) bright, orange ball of light rise gently above the southeast horizon. it hung in the sky about 15 degrees above the lower foothills which define my horizon. it rose to roughly 35 degrees, did not move laterally at all, and after about 20 seconds, it faded, shrank, and winked out. on subsequent evenings i witnessed repeat performances, except that the "light" became "lights", as many as four at a time. i have considered that the lights could be flares, except that they rise slowly, sit still for a bit, and do not fall. i considered general aircraft, but they do not move the way aircraft move. and in "orb" mode, there are no navigation lights. i considered helicopters except that no navigation lights were visible and there was no sound whatsoever. (in my rural area it is very quiet at night, and aircraft, even jets way up in the sky are easily heard).

i now began to look for the lights every evening, and i began to see that even on nights when there were mid-level clouds, the lights appeared - clear and bright, and evidently below the cloud deck. i also began to observe motion in the lights - not at any blinding speed - they seem to drift both laterally and up-and-down, sometimes crossing each other's paths. duration of these sightings has been from a few seconds to several minutes at a time. they continued to fade and wink out after a few minutes.

in november of 2009, i began to see changes in the behavior of the lights - some of them would begin to fade and then change to a strobe mode. when in this strobe mode, they move more quickly, and their changes of direction are abrupt and at acute angles. i also began to see a lot more of the lights at one time in november. when the lights get close to one another (from my vantage, one to three inches apart as viewed between thumb and forefinger of my outstretched arm/hand) they begin to strobe very rapidly. i have seen as many as four "orbs" and twelve "strobes" in the southeast sky over fort collins at one time.

last night (1/24/10) for the first time i saw two "strobes" flying directly over my house from southeast to northwest. i have purchased a pair of long-range binoculars, and i could see very clearly that 
each "strobe" in fact had at least four distinct lights arranged in a 
trapezoidal pattern. 

i would be delighted to find out that these lights are something ordinary, or something military - there is an air force base at cheyenne, wy, about 35 miles northeast of my location. i'm beginning to feel freaked out by the every night nature of this/these sighting(s), and that to my knowledge, nobody else has mentioned these events.

i did, with some trepidation, tell a colleague about these lights. she and her family also live in a rural area northwest of fort collins, but at a lower elevation than i do. she heard me out, and then rather startled, said that her teen daughter has been seeing the same stuff as i have been seeing, and for about the same length of time. i don't know my colleague's daughter at all. i'm not sure whether to feel relieved that someone else is seeing these lights or not. at least if i'm "seeing things", there are two of us.

i'd love to know if anybody else in the area (northern colorado, along the front range corridor - interstate 25 and environs) has seen, reported, or knows for certain what's going on here.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White/gold/orange moving orbs transforming to moving, strobing lights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife woke me up and asked if that star is blinking or is she going crazy. i opened the mini blinds and got out the binoculars.
we live on the beach in ventura and there are no street lights to block out the stars over the ocean and our back yard, we have a clear shot.
with the binos you could clearly see the craft blinking lights of several different colors, red, blue, green and white. while the white lights were on you could just make out the shape of the craft. living here in ventura we have seen missels shot off and the space shuttle come in, this was nothing like i have ever seen before.
i hope it comes back to night.
the craft hung there in the south west sky for about an hour moving west and then just as it was there, it was gone.
my feelings were excitement and thrill.
sorry no photos were taken, we don't have a camara that would capture that awsome site.
content.summary: Flashing lights blue,red,green and white could see some kind of craft with binoculars

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from a party, within five minutes, my brother and i spotted two orbs floating in the sky. we turned around to keep watching them but by that time they were in front of us. we then followed the light and as we approached a hill, we saw the object start lowering into the trees, when it did, it started brightening up way more than at the beginning. it almost looked like it had been many crafts? like a christmas tree ship/ships? when we got to the top of the small hill, the object was gone. we drove up and down the road again to see if we could find it. there is no possible way this object could have been an airplane because we watched it descend into the trees. also, from where we were, the airport would have been a good 5 miles behind us is and is to the west and it lowered ahead due south of us.If it was a plane, we would have seen it circle back around to go to the airport. we tried to go look for it, but it had disappeared. our family was skeptical at first that it was anything, but when it approached us, we were all scared. especially my dad who has seen an upclose ufo on this road. please contact us if you have any questions.
content.summary: Two spherical glowing orbs flaoting in the sky then tried to follow then dropped into the trees!

content.detailedDescription:
It was new year���s eve.  i had not drunk any alcohol and i was quietly drinking a cup of tea when i saw this noiseless light in the horizon.  it went from side to side, and then it came back halfway and dissapeared ... it formed a kneeling-like person.
i was sure of what i saw.  a few minutes later, my roommate came from the street saying that he had seen a ufo.  yes i said, i have seen it too.
afterwards i was put in a psiquiatric home because i had jumped from that same rooftop believing that these sidereal beings wanted me to make a "leap of faith."  i fell down onto the floor.
very dissapointed i awoke in an assylum.  but as time went by, i began to recognize that that place was not simply a clinic, but that it was an extraterrestrial machine, formed by the communnion of minds.
i was released after some time, but my somewhat reckless search for thruth led me back to these clinics.
finally, in the year 1997, i was put in this foster home, which i know for certain is an extraterrestrial ship-base. what leads me to believe this is the amount of parapsychological powers, and empathy that these people show.  and a natural sense of cosmic connection which i feel.  a remembrance of a mission.  i have been chosen as one of many links between dimensions of beings. 
 they form a sort of mafia, keeping themselves hidden from intelectual observation.  they are among us not to analize our mental capacities but to cleanse our conscience.  they are not interested in tecnological science, but in our conscience.  they are completing a universal abduction to bring us, until the last being, back to god.  they are closer to god than we are now.
these beings, however, can be very cold and apparently rootless in their treatment of our pain.  they believe that we are a fallen universe whom they must bring back.
as it is known they communicate through telepathy, sometimes with a almost inaudible pitch in the ear.
i know they must remain hidden, so i know they will.  the secret is that they are not strangers to us, we are all brothers in arms. we must only forget all we know and remember all we knew.  
their presence is like music to the soul.  and they are child-like in every sense ... maybe it is a holly lie but as einstein said, god does not play dices... just don���t tell my shrink !
content.summary: From the rooftop i saw on the horizon a light that formed an "l" in the sky.  i was alone.  a friend came a little time afterwards and he had seen it too.

content.detailedDescription: My brother called and told me to look outside that the orbs were back. he was telling me that there were about six. so we went outside and could not see in the direction because the sun was so bright. so we decided to drive to his house about ten minutes away. we arrived and they were still there once i saw it we took video and caught it on my camera. we managed to watch it as it faded away in the clouds. we had about six family members witness this. my family has seen these orbs alote in this month and finally got them on camera.
content.summary: White orbs in sky

content.detailedDescription:
to whom it may concern,

 first of all, let it be known that i am not a ufo "believer" per say.

 although this occurred approximately 30 years ago, i thought it's time to report to various ufo investigation organizations. i hope this is worthy.
 thank you.

 around the winter of 1980, january perhaps, i just got off work at 9:30 p.M. from the auto dealership. i was a car salesman at the time. i started driving towards the city of toronto, canada, on the qew (queen elizabeth way) eastbound to meet some friends at a bar on the esplanad (a street lined with nightclubs). i didn't have anything to drink, medication and didn't smoke any pot. 

as i was driving, i noticed a string of lights slowly rotating counter clockwise over the city of toronto, at about the ten o'clock position from my point of view. this caught my eye because these formation of lights were very unusual. the lights were evidently in a circular pattern with about two thirds visible as the other third rotated out of view. imagine a pie plate with about 25 lights around the circumference of it. as this "pie plate" would revolve, a third of these lights would be hidden from view as if they were obstructed by a solid body. it was at night so all i could see was these rotating string of lights but they were definitely on a "fixed" platform as the lights were revolving in unison. 

although i've heard of ufo's and was curious, at that time in my life, i didn't really give that much thought about them. i've always been interested in nature and especially about the universe. i've seen all kinds of aircraft and advertising blimps at night before. i drove taxi's off and on for fifteen years on the night shift and have seen countless meteors, lightening, satellites etc. on two occasions i've even seen extremely bright, slow falling, green fireball meteors lighting up the ground, for a couple of seconds, as if it was daylight . i've read, in later years, were other witnesses reported green fireballs as ufo's. i chuckled to myself thinking how easily "ufo believers" can be fooled by natural phenomenon. 

anyway, these circle of lights were slowly descending and approaching towards me (westbound), while i was driving about 115 kilometers per hour on the highway (eastbound). these lights were getting closer and closer as "we" approached each other. i recall thinking to myself that this must be some kind of advertising balloon and those lights were letters. as i kept driving, i was paying more and more attention to this object because the closer it was getting, the more unusual it looked. i kept glancing at it, while driving, waiting until it was close enough to read what these letters were saying, still thinking it was some kind of advertising blimp. the closer it got, the more i looked at it. now at my nine o'clock position, the string of rotating lights appeared to bank left like an airplane would "turning right". actually it wasn't banking at all. it was dipping forward pointing towards the ground. at this point, i realized that these lights were not letters at all. they were different shaped, yellowish white lights. the reason these lights were different in shape was because they were "inset" into some solid body. when the lights were seen head on, they were circular. but as they rotated out of "direct" view, they changed shape like the different crescents of the moon. that's why they appeared to be all different shapes. 

during the time when this object started to bank left, or i thought from my point of view, i was struggling with myself trying to understand whether this was a plane, blimp, or a balloon. it was flying too slow for a plane, yet, too fast for a blimp. also, it didn't appear to be flying or floating. the best way i can describe it's motion is that it looked like it was "sailing" in the sky. 

what's interesting here is that the human brain tries to associate what the eyes are seeing, to something already seen or experienced before. that's why i was at war with myself trying to decide whether this object was a plane, blimp or a balloon. every time i resigned myself to what i must be witnessing, i jumped to another conclusion. this jumping from one conclusion to another occurred during the whole experience. i was imagining all kinds of things. for example, if it was a plane, the only way these lights could have been positioned was in a circle because this plane must have had some kind of supporting structure in a circle from wing tip to wing tip. this didn't make any sense at all. i've seen advertising planes before. this was nothing like this. not even close. than i was trying to imagine a "goodyear blimp" with these letters going across it's side. this was nothing like it either. so here i was, trying to drive and watch this object at the same time. as i was driving, i started to slow down because i kept looking at this circle of lights more than the road ahead of me. in retrospect, i don't even know how i kept my car on the road because i was so awed by this display in the sky. 

here is the killer. 

as the object kept dipping forward more and more, it eventually ended up totally perpendicular to the ground! the first thing that came to mind was a big ferris wheel rotating in the sky. at this point i slowed down to about 50 kph (30 miles an hour in a 60 mph highway for my american friends) and put my four way, flashing hazard lights on my car fearing that another car would crash into the back of me for going so slow on a 100 kph highway. 

here is another shocker. 

as i was mesmerized by this strange looking object, a surge of adrenaline hit me like a ton of bricks. i didn't realize how big this thing was. at first i thought it was the size of an airplane fairly close. it was gigantic! at least twice the size of a football field, bigger than an aircraft carrier!!! i don't know what gave away it's size. maybe the reflections of light on the ground. the best way i can relate this sudden realization is like one of those illusions most of us have seen. you know, when you look at a pixel drawing with an image you can't see until you stare at it for a while? after a period of time, you make out the face of a women or something like that? that's kind of the transformation i experienced. at first i thought the object was the size of a large plane than suddenly i really saw it. it was huge!!! i yelled out loud to my self, "holey f**k, it's huge!!!". i don't f***ing believe it, it's f***ing huge!!!. i thought it was fairly close at first, than bang!, it was much farther away and larger than my brain first comprehended it. speaking about this surge of adrenaline. have you ever had a really close call having a car accident? when your heart rate skyrockets to about 180 beats per minute? that's what i felt when i realized how gargantuan this object was! i could actually feel my heart pounding like crazy. to be frank, it literally scared the hell out of me, when i realized how big it was. at this point, i rolled down my window and pointed to this giant "ferris wheel" in the sky to the other motorists, but it appeared no one seemed to notice as they screamed by me at regular highway speeds. i remember how cold it was when i rolled down my window. it was something like minus 30 celsius below zero. 

after, i don't know how long, probably only a few seconds of rotating in this perpendicular position, this thing started to climb and right itself and "sail" back to the direction it originally came from. i rolled up my window, turned off my hazard lights, and started to speed up to chase it. still it seemed other motorists didn't notice this object. it still irks me to this day. as i was approaching the city limits, this object was in it's flat position again climbing over the city. then, all of a sudden, the rotating lights turned off except for a red "aircraft like" blinking light (which i never noticed before). after a few seconds, the rotating lights turned on again. it was like in the movie "close encounters of the third kind". the lights just blasted on. than after a few seconds they turned off again as it seemed to be right over the city. strange behavior. now i was exiting off of the highway on to spadina rd. i lost track of these lights because of the tall buildings. when i was on the street where i was going, i saw a cop parked on the other side of the road writing a parking ticked. i stopped in the middle of the road and ran over to him. he was quite taken aback by my seemingly aggressive approach. i asked him, "how long have you been here?" i forgot what he said, but i asked, "did you see that big circle of lights flying in the sky? he said "no". after parking my car, i met my friends at the bar, "baily's", and told them what happened but they didn't take me seriously as they've already had a few and were more interested in the ladies. 

after sitting at the bar by myself for a couple of hours i went home. i was living at my parent's house at the time, temporarily, so when i got home around 1 a.M., i called the police. i didn't know who else to phone at the time. they didn't take me seriously of course so after that, i phoned the toronto international airport and managed to get through to air traffic control and asked them if they had anyone call in with a ufo report. nothing. so i called the police again and convinced them to take me seriously as i wanted to make a report. they told me they can send a couple of officers to my house. as it was late and my parents were asleep, i told them i'd rather come to the station the next day to report. next morning, when i contemplated going in i decided not to, fearing they would think i'm some kind of wacko. 

as the days went by, scanning the newspapers looking for a "ufo sighting" to no avail, i started doubting myself. i was trying to convince myself that perhaps i was somehow mistaken. maybe it was something not out of the ordinary at all. maybe it was a balloon or airplane of some kind. maybe like thousands of others, i witnessed something that i misinterpreted for something else. 

and now the conclusion. 

about a week or so later, on or about the tenth page of the toronto star, bottom right hand corner, there it was! a short article. "dozens of mississauga residents reported a ufo as big as a football field!!!" i don't recall the whole article. "finally" i said to myself. "i knew it was real", "i knew i didn't imagine this". i'll never, ever, doubt myself again no matter how much ridicule i'll be subjected to. i have only one regret however. that is i wish i had others with me to experience this. after about 27 years, i just had to let this out.
content.summary: "dozens of mississauga residence report a ufo as big as a football field"

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a video portrait of a woman at the beach for 10 seconds when an interesting light appeared in the left, continues to travel slowly to the right and then disappears. not sure if it is an airplane in the rain clouds. what is interesting to me is the light has to be fairly close to be seen through the clouds. the high of it is lower than an airplane would be flying, unless it was approaching the santa barbara airport, however i did not see any lights like this in my other footage. 


i also have another event that happened about a month ago, i was working in my garden in the evening and something made me look up, when i looked up at the hillside next to me i saw a large light moving fast for about the length of a hand in measurement when looking at the sky. after that the light disappeared, i got the feeling as if it were cloaking itself. the size of it was similar to a full moon, definitely a large object, and it was moving upward in the sky, which also seemed important. the edges were sharp, and it did not seem like light was emitting out from it, almost like someone put a sheet over it.
content.summary: Orb/ufo appears in left corner of video during documentary portrait

content.detailedDescription: While outside with my dog walking around the house, i noticed this huge bright object moving smoothly from northwest towards an east southeast direction. i would calculate altitude around 8 thousand feet based on airliners passing overhead continously during the day over 10 thousand feet. the sky is clear, cool, light breeze. i called my wife out to see it and the object made a smooth 45 degree turn towards the east for about 3 seconds then turned just as smoothly towards a southern direction. no sound, no anti-collision lights, just one big yellowish sphere. this object was bigger than the current planets out tonight or any star on the orion constellation. as it moved south it just dimmed out and dissappeared. as big and bright as this thing was it would have been visible for another 2 or 3 minutes as it moved along. even my dog just stared at it.
content.summary: Moving object from west northwest to east southeast
